'''Sowel Devosiana'''是日本的《[[eXceed]]》系列弹幕游戏及其衍生作品的登场角色之一。

==简介==
《[[eXceed-GUN BULLET CHILDREN-]]》与《eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE-》的登场角色。

==事迹==

《eXceed-GUN BULLET CHILDREN-》中的三自机之一，《eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE-》及《eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE REX-》 中的三面BOSS。

===[[eXceed-GUN BULLET CHILDREN-]]===

{{Hide
|标题=英文原文
|内容=
Sowel volunteered for the Gun Bullet Children program to avenge the deaths of her parents who were killed by vampires.
Her calm demeanor and level-headedness in battle have earned her the position of the defacto leader of the Gun Bullet Children.
She wields the power ‘Byte Kingdom’ which can summon a Killing Doll that will automatically target and attack enemies. <ref>exceed-gbc人物官方介绍页[http://exceedseries.com/exceed-gbc_main/chrs_gb]</ref>
}}
Sowel志愿成为教会的枪弹少女(Gun Bullet Children)为了报杀害了她双亲的吸血鬼的仇。

她冷静的举止和高级的头脑使她在战中成为了枪弹少女(Gun Bullet Children)的实际首领。

她使用能力’Byte Kingdom’来召唤一只杀戮人偶来自动瞄准和攻击敌人。

===[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE-]]===

{{Hide
|标题=英文原文
|内容=
A member of the Church’s Gun Bullet Children, Sowel became an Exorcist of the Church to pursue a personal vengeance and shows no mercy to deviants.
She uses the summoner’s art of Byte Kingdom, which commands Sylph, one of the Four Major Elementals. <ref>[http://exceedseries.com/2nd-vampire-rex/chrs_2vr]</ref>
}}

教会的枪弹少女(Gun Bullet Children)的一员，Sowel成为教会的驱魔者来实现个人的复仇和显示对变异者的毫不留情。

她是使用Byte Kingdom的召唤术士，用来命令四大基本元素之一的风精灵（Sylph）。
